name: Dead Giveaway
description:
Santa's elves have been infected with a virus turning them into zombies! They've had enough of all the years of labour with no pay and no reward. Now the zombie elves want revenge. Santa's only resort is to give them an unending amount of presents.

Dead Giveaway is a game where the player has their typing abilities put to the test in wave based rounds of zombie hordes. Type each gift above a zombies head to launch a present at them. The faster you type the faster Santa creates and launches gifts at his undead elves.

This game was created in 48 hours for the Yogscast Game Jam 2019

Credits :

Cherkira Bau-mann - Environment Artist

Joseph Gallear - Programmer

Valdemaras Tomasevicius - Character Artist
